table.name: field_formula
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `field_formula` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `active` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `formula_field` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `formula` varchar(5000) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
